description:
Again, Bunji chooses to continue playing even though he needs to go to the bathroom so he ends up peeing himself. That`s when the discipline Gods appear before the exhausted mom; Mom always points out how good of a child Fumi is but on occasion, she unexpectedly scolds her quite harshly. On that particular day, she punished her mistakenly; Recently, Fumi has been acting strangely giving Bunji some attitude; One evening, mom forgot about something she had to take care of and ended up rushing out of the house without her bag. She went to give Bunji and Fumi the things they forgot but it started to get late...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do whatever / Sorry / It`s contagious / Street at night
してやったり / めっ / うつるんです / 夜道
